The user is running the install-docker.ps1 script and encountering an error. The error messages show that the bash script has Windows-style line endings (CRLF - \r\n) instead of Unix-style line endings (LF - \n). This is causing the bash interpreter to fail because it's treating the carriage return (\r) as part of the commands.

The issue is in how the script is being written to the temp file. The `Out-File` command is creating the file with Windows line endings, but WSL/bash expects Unix line endings.

I need to fix this by ensuring the script is written with Unix line endings (LF only). In PowerShell, I can do this by:
1. Using `[System.IO.File]::WriteAllText()` with proper line endings
2. Or converting the line endings before writing

Let me fix the script to use Unix line endings when writing the bash script.
response.generatedTitle: Encountered error due to incorrect line endings

response.value:
The error shows that the bash script is being saved with Windows line endings (CRLF `\r\n`) instead of Unix line endings (LF `\n`). WSL's bash can't execute scripts with Windows line endings.

I'll fix this by ensuring the script is saved with Unix line endings:

Fixed! The issue was that `Out-File` was saving the bash script with Windows line endings (CRLF), which bash in WSL cannot interpret.

**Changes made:**
- Replaced `Out-File` with `[System.IO.File]::WriteAllText()` 
- Added line ending conversion: `-replace "`r`n", "`n" -replace "`r", "`n"` to ensure Unix LF format
- Used UTF8 encoding without BOM (Byte Order Mark) which can also cause issues in bash

Now run the script again:

```powershell
.\install-docker.ps1
```

<attachments>
<attachment id="install-docker.ps1" filePath="d:\\Repos\\_pm\\scripts\\docker\\install-docker.ps1">
# Script para instalar Docker Engine no Windows (WSL2)
# Autor: GitHub Copilot
# Data: 2026-01-30
# Nota: Este script instala o Docker Engine via WSL2, n√£o o Docker Desktop

# Cores para output
$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"

Write-Host "üê≥ Instalando Docker Engine via WSL2..." -ForegroundColor Cyan

# Fun√ß√£o para verificar se est√° rodando como administrador
function Test-Administrator {
    $currentUser = [Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity]::GetCurrent()
    $principal = New-Object Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal($currentUser)
    return $principal.IsInRole([Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole]::Administrator)
}

# Verificar privil√©gios de administrador
if (-not (Test-Administrator)) {
    Write-Host "‚ùå Este script precisa ser executado como Administrador!" -ForegroundColor Red
    Write-Host "üí° Clique com o bot√£o direito no PowerShell e selecione 'Executar como administrador'" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    exit 1
}

# Verificar se WSL est√° instalado
Write-Host "üîç Verificando instala√ß√£o do WSL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$wslInstalled = $false
try {
    $wslVersion = wsl --version 2>$null
    if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
        $wslInstalled = $true
    }
} catch {
    $wslInstalled = $false
}

if (-not $wslInstalled) {
    Write-Host "üì¶ WSL n√£o est√° instalado. Instalando WSL2..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    
    try {
        wsl --install --no-distribution
        Write-Host "‚úÖ WSL2 instalado com sucesso!" -ForegroundColor Green
        Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è  √â necess√°rio reiniciar o computador para continuar." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        Write-Host "üí° Ap√≥s reiniciar, execute este script novamente." -ForegroundColor Cyan
        
        $restart = Read-Host "Deseja reiniciar agora? (s/n)"
        if ($restart -eq "s" -or $restart -eq "S") {
            Restart-Computer -Force
        }
        exit 0
    } catch {
        Write-Host "‚ùå Erro ao instalar WSL: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
        exit 1
    }
} else {
    Write-Host "‚úÖ WSL j√° est√° instalado" -ForegroundColor Green
}

# Verificar se existe uma distribui√ß√£o Linux instalada
Write-Host "üîç Verificando distribui√ß√µes Linux instaladas..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$distros = wsl --list --quiet 2>$null | Where-Object { $_ -and $_.Trim() -ne "" }

if (-not $distros -or $distros.Count -eq 0) {
    Write-Host "üì¶ Nenhuma distribui√ß√£o Linux encontrada. Instalando Ubuntu..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    
    try {
        wsl --install -d Ubuntu
        Write-Host "‚úÖ Ubuntu instalado com sucesso!" -ForegroundColor Green
        Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è  Configure seu usu√°rio e senha no Ubuntu que ser√° aberto." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        Write-Host "üí° Ap√≥s configurar, execute este script novamente para instalar o Docker." -ForegroundColor Cyan
        exit 0
    } catch {
        Write-Host "‚ùå Erro ao instalar Ubuntu: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
        exit 1
    }
} else {
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Distribui√ß√£o Linux encontrada: $($distros[0])" -ForegroundColor Green
}

# Verificar se Docker j√° est√° instalado no WSL
Write-Host "üîç Verificando se Docker j√° est√° instalado no WSL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$dockerInstalled = wsl docker --version 2>$null
if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0 -and $dockerInstalled) {
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Docker j√° est√° instalado no WSL: $dockerInstalled" -ForegroundColor Green
    
    # Verificar se o servi√ßo est√° rodando
    $dockerRunning = wsl docker info 2>$null
    if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
        Write-Host "‚úÖ Docker est√° rodando!" -ForegroundColor Green
    } else {
        Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è  Docker est√° instalado mas n√£o est√° rodando." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        Write-Host "üîÑ Iniciando servi√ßo Docker..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        wsl sudo service docker start
        if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
            Write-Host "‚úÖ Servi√ßo Docker iniciado com sucesso!" -ForegroundColor Green
        } else {
            Write-Host "‚ùå Erro ao iniciar servi√ßo Docker" -ForegroundColor Red
        }
    }
    exit 0
}

# Instalar Docker no WSL
Write-Host "üì¶ Instalando Docker Engine no WSL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

# Script de instala√ß√£o do Docker para rodar no WSL
$dockerInstallScript = @'
#!/bin/bash
set -e

# Cores
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m'

echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Instalando Docker Engine...${NC}"

# Remover vers√µes antigas se existirem
echo -e "${YELLOW}üßπ Removendo vers√µes antigas do Docker (se existirem)...${NC}"
for pkg in docker.io docker-doc docker-compose docker-compose-v2 podman-docker containerd runc; do
    sudo apt-get remove -y $pkg 2>/dev/null || true
done

# Atualizar pacotes
echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Atualizando lista de pacotes...${NC}"
sudo apt-get update

# Instalar depend√™ncias
echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Instalando depend√™ncias...${NC}"
sudo apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg

# Adicionar chave GPG oficial do Docker
echo -e "${YELLOW}üîë Adicionando chave GPG do Docker...${NC}"
sudo install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings
curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg --yes
sudo chmod a+r /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg

# Adicionar reposit√≥rio do Docker
echo -e "${YELLOW}üìã Adicionando reposit√≥rio do Docker...${NC}"
echo \
  "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \
  $(. /etc/os-release && echo "$VERSION_CODENAME") stable" | \
  sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null

# Atualizar e instalar Docker
echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Instalando Docker Engine...${NC}"
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin

# Adicionar usu√°rio ao grupo docker
echo -e "${YELLOW}üë§ Adicionando usu√°rio ao grupo docker...${NC}"
sudo usermod -aG docker $USER

# Iniciar servi√ßo Docker
echo -e "${YELLOW}üöÄ Iniciando servi√ßo Docker...${NC}"
sudo service docker start

# Verificar instala√ß√£o
echo -e "${YELLOW}üîç Verificando instala√ß√£o...${NC}"
sudo docker run --rm hello-world

echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker Engine instalado com sucesso!${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}üí° Para usar docker sem sudo, fa√ßa logout e login novamente ou execute: newgrp docker${NC}"
'@

# Salvar script tempor√°rio e executar no WSL
$tempScript = [System.IO.Path]::GetTempFileName() -replace '\.tmp$', '.sh'
$dockerInstallScript | Out-File -FilePath $tempScript -Encoding utf8 -NoNewline

# Converter caminho Windows para WSL
$wslPath = wsl wslpath -u ($tempScript -replace '\\', '/')

# Executar script no WSL
Write-Host "üöÄ Executando instala√ß√£o no WSL..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
wsl bash $wslPath

if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Docker Engine instalado com sucesso no WSL!" -ForegroundColor Green
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "üìã Para usar o Docker:" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ Abra o WSL (digite 'wsl' no terminal)" -ForegroundColor White
    Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ Use comandos docker normalmente (docker run, docker ps, etc.)" -ForegroundColor White
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "üí° Dica: Para usar 'docker' diretamente do PowerShell, adicione ao seu perfil:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    Write-Host '   function docker { wsl docker $args }' -ForegroundColor Gray
    Write-Host '   function docker-compose { wsl docker compose $args }' -ForegroundColor Gray
} else {
    Write-Host "‚ùå Erro durante a instala√ß√£o do Docker" -ForegroundColor Red
    exit 1
}

# Limpar arquivo tempor√°rio
Remove-Item -Path $tempScript -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
</attachment>

# Script para instalar Docker Engine no Windows (WSL2)
# Autor: GitHub Copilot
# Data: 2026-01-30
# Nota: Este script instala o Docker Engine via WSL2, n√£o o Docker Desktop

# Cores para output
$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"

Write-Host "üê≥ Instalando Docker Engine via WSL2..." -ForegroundColor Cyan

# Fun√ß√£o para verificar se est√° rodando como administrador
function Test-Administrator {
    $currentUser = [Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity]::GetCurrent()
    $principal = New-Object Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal($currentUser)
    return $principal.IsInRole([Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole]::Administrator)
}

# Verificar privil√©gios de administrador
if (-not (Test-Administrator)) {
    Write-Host "‚ùå Este script precisa ser executado como Administrador!" -ForegroundColor Red
    Write-Host "üí° Clique com o bot√£o direito no PowerShell e selecione 'Executar como administrador'" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    exit 1
}

# Verificar se WSL est√° instalado
Write-Host "üîç Verificando instala√ß√£o do WSL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$wslInstalled = $false
try {
    $wslVersion = wsl --version 2>$null
    if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
        $wslInstalled = $true
    }
} catch {
    $wslInstalled = $false
}

if (-not $wslInstalled) {
    Write-Host "üì¶ WSL n√£o est√° instalado. Instalando WSL2..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    
    try {
        wsl --install --no-distribution
        Write-Host "‚úÖ WSL2 instalado com sucesso!" -ForegroundColor Green
        Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è  √â necess√°rio reiniciar o computador para continuar." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        Write-Host "üí° Ap√≥s reiniciar, execute este script novamente." -ForegroundColor Cyan
        
        $restart = Read-Host "Deseja reiniciar agora? (s/n)"
        if ($restart -eq "s" -or $restart -eq "S") {
            Restart-Computer -Force
        }
        exit 0
    } catch {
        Write-Host "‚ùå Erro ao instalar WSL: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
        exit 1
    }
} else {
    Write-Host "‚úÖ WSL j√° est√° instalado" -ForegroundColor Green
}

# Verificar se existe uma distribui√ß√£o Linux instalada
Write-Host "üîç Verificando distribui√ß√µes Linux instaladas..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$distros = wsl --list --quiet 2>$null | Where-Object { $_ -and $_.Trim() -ne "" }

if (-not $distros -or $distros.Count -eq 0) {
    Write-Host "üì¶ Nenhuma distribui√ß√£o Linux encontrada. Instalando Ubuntu..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    
    try {
        wsl --install -d Ubuntu
        Write-Host "‚úÖ Ubuntu instalado com sucesso!" -ForegroundColor Green
        Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è  Configure seu usu√°rio e senha no Ubuntu que ser√° aberto." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        Write-Host "üí° Ap√≥s configurar, execute este script novamente para instalar o Docker." -ForegroundColor Cyan
        exit 0
    } catch {
        Write-Host "‚ùå Erro ao instalar Ubuntu: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
        exit 1
    }
} else {
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Distribui√ß√£o Linux encontrada: $($distros[0])" -ForegroundColor Green
}

# Verificar se Docker j√° est√° instalado no WSL
Write-Host "üîç Verificando se Docker j√° est√° instalado no WSL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$dockerInstalled = wsl docker --version 2>$null
if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0 -and $dockerInstalled) {
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Docker j√° est√° instalado no WSL: $dockerInstalled" -ForegroundColor Green
    
    # Verificar se o servi√ßo est√° rodando
    $dockerRunning = wsl docker info 2>$null
    if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
        Write-Host "‚úÖ Docker est√° rodando!" -ForegroundColor Green
    } else {
        Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è  Docker est√° instalado mas n√£o est√° rodando." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        Write-Host "üîÑ Iniciando servi√ßo Docker..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        wsl sudo service docker start
        if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
            Write-Host "‚úÖ Servi√ßo Docker iniciado com sucesso!" -ForegroundColor Green
        } else {
            Write-Host "‚ùå Erro ao iniciar servi√ßo Docker" -ForegroundColor Red
        }
    }
    exit 0
}

# Instalar Docker no WSL
Write-Host "üì¶ Instalando Docker Engine no WSL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

# Script de instala√ß√£o do Docker para rodar no WSL
$dockerInstallScript = @'
#!/bin/bash
set -e

# Cores
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m'

echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Instalando Docker Engine...${NC}"

# Remover vers√µes antigas se existirem
echo -e "${YELLOW}üßπ Removendo vers√µes antigas do Docker (se existirem)...${NC}"
for pkg in docker.io docker-doc docker-compose docker-compose-v2 podman-docker containerd runc; do
    sudo apt-get remove -y $pkg 2>/dev/null || true
done

# Atualizar pacotes
echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Atualizando lista de pacotes...${NC}"
sudo apt-get update

# Instalar depend√™ncias
echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Instalando depend√™ncias...${NC}"
sudo apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg

# Adicionar chave GPG oficial do Docker
echo -e "${YELLOW}üîë Adicionando chave GPG do Docker...${NC}"
sudo install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings
curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg --yes
sudo chmod a+r /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg

# Adicionar reposit√≥rio do Docker
echo -e "${YELLOW}üìã Adicionando reposit√≥rio do Docker...${NC}"
echo \
  "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \
  $(. /etc/os-release && echo "$VERSION_CODENAME") stable" | \
  sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null

# Atualizar e instalar Docker
echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Instalando Docker Engine...${NC}"
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin

# Adicionar usu√°rio ao grupo docker
echo -e "${YELLOW}üë§ Adicionando usu√°rio ao grupo docker...${NC}"
sudo usermod -aG docker $USER

# Iniciar servi√ßo Docker
echo -e "${YELLOW}üöÄ Iniciando servi√ßo Docker...${NC}"
sudo service docker start

# Verificar instala√ß√£o
echo -e "${YELLOW}üîç Verificando instala√ß√£o...${NC}"
sudo docker run --rm hello-world

echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker Engine instalado com sucesso!${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}üí° Para usar docker sem sudo, fa√ßa logout e login novamente ou execute: newgrp docker${NC}"
'@

# Salvar script tempor√°rio e executar no WSL (com line endings Unix LF)
$tempScript = [System.IO.Path]::GetTempFileName() -replace '\.tmp$', '.sh'
$dockerInstallScriptLF = $dockerInstallScript -replace "`r`n", "`n" -replace "`r", "`n"
[System.IO.File]::WriteAllText($tempScript, $dockerInstallScriptLF, [System.Text.UTF8Encoding]::new($false))

# Converter caminho Windows para WSL
$wslPath = wsl wslpath -u ($tempScript -replace '\\', '/')

# Executar script no WSL
Write-Host "üöÄ Executando instala√ß√£o no WSL..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
wsl bash $wslPath

if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Docker Engine instalado com sucesso no WSL!" -ForegroundColor Green
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "üìã Para usar o Docker:" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ Abra o WSL (digite 'wsl' no terminal)" -ForegroundColor White
    Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ Use comandos docker normalmente (docker run, docker ps, etc.)" -ForegroundColor White
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "üí° Dica: Para usar 'docker' diretamente do PowerShell, adicione ao seu perfil:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    Write-Host '   function docker { wsl docker $args }' -ForegroundColor Gray
    Write-Host '   function docker-compose { wsl docker compose $args }' -ForegroundColor Gray
} else {
    Write-Host "‚ùå Erro durante a instala√ß√£o do Docker" -ForegroundColor Red
    exit 1
}

# Limpar arquivo tempor√°rio
Remove-Item -Path $tempScript -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

<attachment id="install-docker.ps1" filePath="d:\\Repos\\_pm\\scripts\\docker\\install-docker.ps1">
# Script para instalar Docker Engine no Windows (WSL2)
# Autor: GitHub Copilot
# Data: 2026-01-30
# Nota: Este script instala o Docker Engine via WSL2, n√£o o Docker Desktop

# Cores para output
$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"

Write-Host "üê≥ Instalando Docker Engine via WSL2..." -ForegroundColor Cyan

# Fun√ß√£o para verificar se est√° rodando como administrador
function Test-Administrator {
    $currentUser = [Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity]::GetCurrent()
    $principal = New-Object Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal($currentUser)
    return $principal.IsInRole([Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole]::Administrator)
}

# Verificar privil√©gios de administrador
if (-not (Test-Administrator)) {
    Write-Host "‚ùå Este script precisa ser executado como Administrador!" -ForegroundColor Red
    Write-Host "üí° Clique com o bot√£o direito no PowerShell e selecione 'Executar como administrador'" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    exit 1
}

# Verificar se WSL est√° instalado
Write-Host "üîç Verificando instala√ß√£o do WSL..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$wslInstalled = $false
try {
    $wslVersion = wsl --version 2>$null
    if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
        $wslInstalled = $true
    }
} catch {
    $wslInstalled = $false
}

if (-not $wslInstalled) {
    Write-Host "üì¶ WSL n√£o est√° instalado. Instalando WSL2..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    
    try {
        wsl --install --no-distribution
        Write-Host "‚úÖ WSL2 instalado com sucesso!" -ForegroundColor Green
        Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è  √â necess√°rio reiniciar o computador para continuar." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        Write-Host "üí° Ap√≥s reiniciar, execute este script novamente." -ForegroundColor Cyan
        
        $restart = Read-Host "Deseja reiniciar agora? (s/n)"
        if ($restart -eq "s" -or $restart -eq "S") {
            Restart-Computer -Force
        }
        exit 0
    } catch {
        Write-Host "‚ùå Erro ao instalar WSL: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
        exit 1
    }
} else {
    Write-Host "‚úÖ WSL j√° est√° instalado" -ForegroundColor Green
}

# Verificar se existe uma distribui√ß√£o Linux instalada
Write-Host "üîç Verificando distribui√ß√µes Linux instaladas..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$distroList = wsl --list --quiet 2>$null | Where-Object { $_ -and $_.Trim() -ne "" -and $_ -notmatch "docker-desktop" }
# Limpar caracteres nulos que o WSL √†s vezes retorna
$distroList = $distroList | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "`0", "" } | Where-Object { $_.Trim() -ne "" }

if (-not $distroList -or @($distroList).Count -eq 0) {
    Write-Host "üì¶ Nenhuma distribui√ß√£o Linux encontrada. Instalando Ubuntu..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
    
    try {
        wsl --install -d Ubuntu
        Write-Host "‚úÖ Ubuntu instalado com sucesso!" -ForegroundColor Green
        Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è  Configure seu usu√°rio e senha no Ubuntu que ser√° aberto." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        Write-Host "üí° Ap√≥s configurar, execute este script novamente para instalar o Docker." -ForegroundColor Cyan
        exit 0
    } catch {
        Write-Host "‚ùå Erro ao instalar Ubuntu: $_" -ForegroundColor Red
        exit 1
    }
}

# Converter para array se necess√°rio
$distroList = @($distroList)

# Selecionar distro
if ($distroList.Count -eq 1) {
    $selectedDistro = $distroList[0].Trim()
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Distribui√ß√£o Linux encontrada: $selectedDistro" -ForegroundColor Green
} else {
    Write-Host "üìã M√∫ltiplas distribui√ß√µes Linux encontradas:" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    for ($i = 0; $i -lt $distroList.Count; $i++) {
        Write-Host "   [$($i + 1)] $($distroList[$i].Trim())" -ForegroundColor White
    }
    Write-Host ""
    
    do {
        $selection = Read-Host "üêß Escolha a distribui√ß√£o (1-$($distroList.Count))"
        $selectionIndex = [int]$selection - 1
    } while ($selectionIndex -lt 0 -or $selectionIndex -ge $distroList.Count)
    
    $selectedDistro = $distroList[$selectionIndex].Trim()
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Distribui√ß√£o selecionada: $selectedDistro" -ForegroundColor Green
}

# Fun√ß√£o para executar comando no WSL com output formatado
function Invoke-WslCommand {
    param(
        [string]$Command,
        [string]$Distro,
        [switch]$PassThru
    )
    
    $wslOutput = if ($Distro) {
        wsl -d $Distro -- bash -c $Command 2>&1
    } else {
        wsl -- bash -c $Command 2>&1
    }
    
    if ($PassThru) {
        return $wslOutput
    }
    
    # Exibir output com prefixo WSL
    foreach ($line in $wslOutput) {
        if ($line) {
            Write-Host "[WSL] " -ForegroundColor Magenta -NoNewline
            Write-Host $line -ForegroundColor DarkGray
        }
    }
    
    return $LASTEXITCODE
}

# Verificar se Docker j√° est√° instalado no WSL
Write-Host "üîç Verificando se Docker j√° est√° instalado no WSL ($selectedDistro)..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$dockerInstalled = wsl -d $selectedDistro -- docker --version 2>$null
if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0 -and $dockerInstalled) {
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Docker j√° est√° instalado no WSL: $dockerInstalled" -ForegroundColor Green
    
    # Verificar se o servi√ßo est√° rodando
    $dockerRunning = wsl -d $selectedDistro -- docker info 2>$null
    if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
        Write-Host "‚úÖ Docker est√° rodando!" -ForegroundColor Green
    } else {
        Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è  Docker est√° instalado mas n√£o est√° rodando." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        Write-Host "üîÑ Iniciando servi√ßo Docker..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
        wsl -d $selectedDistro -- sudo service docker start
        if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {

        } else {
            Write-Host "‚ùå Erro ao iniciar servi√ßo Docker" -ForegroundColor Red
        }
    }
    exit 0
}

# Instalar Docker no WSL
Write-Host "üì¶ Instalando Docker Engine no WSL ($selectedDistro)..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host ""

$dockerInstallScript = @'
#!/bin/bash
set -e

# Cores

GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m'

echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Instalando Docker Engine...${NC}"

# Remover vers√µes antigas se existirem
echo -e "${YELLOW}üßπ Removendo vers√µes antigas do Docker (se existirem)...${NC}"

# Iniciar servi√ßo Docker
echo -e "${YELLOW}üöÄ Iniciando servi√ßo Docker...${NC}"

echo -e "${YELLOW}üîç Verificando instala√ß√£o...${NC}"

# Converter caminho Windows para WSL
$wslPath = wsl -d $selectedDistro -- wslpath -u ($tempScript -replace '\\', '/')

# Executar script no WSL com output diferenciado
Write-Host "üöÄ Executando instala√ß√£o no WSL..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host ""

# Executar e capturar output linha por linha para formata√ß√£o
$process = New-Object System.Diagnostics.Process
$process.StartInfo.FileName = "wsl.exe"
$process.StartInfo.Arguments = "-d $selectedDistro -- bash `"$wslPath`""
$process.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = $false
$process.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = $true
$process.StartInfo.RedirectStandardError = $true
$process.StartInfo.CreateNoWindow = $true
$process.StartInfo.StandardOutputEncoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8

    }
}

$process.BeginErrorReadLine()

Write-Host "üöÄ Executando desinstala√ß√£o no WSL..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host ""

# Executar e capturar output linha por linha para formata√ß√£o
$process = New-Object System.Diagnostics.Process
$process.StartInfo.FileName = "wsl.exe"
$process.StartInfo.Arguments = "-d $selectedDistro -- bash `"$wslPath`""
$process.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = $false
$process.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = $true
$process.StartInfo.RedirectStandardError = $true
$process.StartInfo.CreateNoWindow = $true
$process.StartInfo.StandardOutputEncoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8
$process.StartInfo.StandardErrorEncoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8

# Event handlers para output em tempo real
$outputHandler = {
    if ($EventArgs.Data) {
        Write-Host "[WSL] " -ForegroundColor Magenta -NoNewline
        Write-Host $EventArgs.Data -ForegroundColor Gray
    }
}

$errorHandler = {
    if ($EventArgs.Data) {
        Write-Host "[WSL] " -ForegroundColor Magenta -NoNewline
        Write-Host $EventArgs.Data -ForegroundColor DarkYellow
    }
}

$process.add_OutputDataReceived($outputHandler)
$process.add_ErrorDataReceived($errorHandler)

$process.Start() | Out-Null
$process.BeginOutputReadLine()
$process.BeginErrorReadLine()
$process.WaitForExit()

$exitCode = $process.ExitCode

Write-Host ""","newString":"# Executar script no WSL com output diferenciado
Write-Host "üöÄ Executando desinstala√ß√£o no WSL..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host ""

# Usar job para capturar stderr enquanto lemos stdout sincronamente
$pinfo = New-Object System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo
$pinfo.FileName = "wsl.exe"
$pinfo.Arguments = "-d $selectedDistro -- bash `"$wslPath`""
$pinfo.UseShellExecute = $false
$pinfo.RedirectStandardOutput = $true
$pinfo.RedirectStandardError = $true
$pinfo.CreateNoWindow = $true

$process = New-Object System.Diagnostics.Process
$process.StartInfo = $pinfo
$process.Start() | Out-Null

# Ler stdout e stderr alternadamente
while (-not $process.HasExited) {
    # Ler stdout
    while (-not $process.StandardOutput.EndOfStream) {
        $line = $process.StandardOutput.ReadLine()
        if ($line) {
            Write-Host "[WSL] " -ForegroundColor Magenta -NoNewline

}

        Write-Host "[WSL] " -ForegroundColor Magenta -NoNewline
        Write-Host $line -ForegroundColor DarkYellow
    }
}

$exitCode = $process.ExitCode
$process.Dispose()

{"filePath": "d:\Repos\_pm\scripts\docker\install-docker-engine.sh", "content": "#!/bin/bash
# Script para instalar Docker Engine no Linux (Ubuntu/Debian)
# Autor: GitHub Copilot
# Data: 2026-01-30
# Uso: ./install-docker-engine.sh
# Nota: Requer sudo/root

set -e

# Cores
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m'

# Verificar se est√° rodando como root ou com sudo dispon√≠vel
check_privileges() {
    if [ "$EUID" -ne 0 ]; then
        if ! command -v sudo &> /dev/null; then
            echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Este script precisa ser executado como root ou ter sudo dispon√≠vel${NC}"
            exit 1
        fi
        SUDO="sudo"
    else
        SUDO=""
    fi
}

# Detectar distribui√ß√£o
detect_distro() {
    if [ -f /etc/os-release ]; then
        . /etc/os-release
        DISTRO=$ID
        VERSION_CODENAME=${VERSION_CODENAME:-$UBUNTU_CODENAME}
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå N√£o foi poss√≠vel detectar a distribui√ß√£o Linux${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    case $DISTRO in
        ubuntu|debian)
            echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Distribui√ß√£o detectada: $DISTRO ($VERSION_CODENAME)${NC}"
            ;;
        *)
            echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Distribui√ß√£o n√£o suportada: $DISTRO${NC}"
            echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Este script suporta: Ubuntu, Debian${NC}"
            exit 1
            ;;
    esac
}

# Verificar se Docker j√° est√° instalado
check_docker_installed() {
    if command -v docker &> /dev/null; then
        DOCKER_VERSION=$(docker --version 2>/dev/null || echo "desconhecida")
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker j√° est√° instalado: $DOCKER_VERSION${NC}"
        
        # Verificar se est√° rodando
        if $SUDO docker info &> /dev/null; then
            echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker est√° rodando!${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  Docker instalado mas n√£o est√° rodando${NC}"
            echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Iniciando servi√ßo Docker...${NC}"
            $SUDO service docker start || $SUDO systemctl start docker
            echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Servi√ßo Docker iniciado!${NC}"
        fi
        exit 0
    fi
}

# Instalar Docker
install_docker() {
    echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Instalando Docker Engine...${NC}"
    
    # Remover vers√µes antigas se existirem
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üßπ Removendo vers√µes antigas do Docker (se existirem)...${NC}"
    for pkg in docker.io docker-doc docker-compose docker-compose-v2 podman-docker containerd runc; do
        $SUDO apt-get remove -y $pkg 2>/dev/null || true
    done
    
    # Atualizar pacotes
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Atualizando lista de pacotes...${NC}"
    $SUDO apt-get update
    
    # Instalar depend√™ncias
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Instalando depend√™ncias...${NC}"
    $SUDO apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg
    
    # Adicionar chave GPG oficial do Docker
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîë Adicionando chave GPG do Docker...${NC}"
    $SUDO install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings
    curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/$DISTRO/gpg | $SUDO gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg --yes
    $SUDO chmod a+r /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg
    
    # Adicionar reposit√≥rio do Docker
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìã Adicionando reposit√≥rio do Docker...${NC}"
    echo \
      "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/$DISTRO \
      $VERSION_CODENAME stable" | \
      $SUDO tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null
    
    # Atualizar e instalar Docker
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Instalando Docker Engine...${NC}"
    $SUDO apt-get update
    $SUDO apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin
    
    # Adicionar usu√°rio ao grupo docker
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üë§ Adicionando usu√°rio ao grupo docker...${NC}"
    $SUDO usermod -aG docker $USER
    
    # Iniciar servi√ßo Docker
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üöÄ Iniciando servi√ßo Docker...${NC}"
    $SUDO service docker start || $SUDO systemctl start docker
    
    # Verificar instala√ß√£o
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîç Verificando instala√ß√£o...${NC}"
    $SUDO docker run --rm hello-world
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker Engine instalado com sucesso!${NC}"
    echo -e "${CYAN}üí° Para usar docker sem sudo, fa√ßa logout e login novamente ou execute: newgrp docker${NC}"
}

# Main
main() {
    echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Instalador do Docker Engine${NC}"
    echo ""
    
    check_privileges
    detect_distro
    check_docker_installed
    install_docker
}

main "$@"
"}

{"content": "#!/bin/bash
# Script para desinstalar Docker Engine do Linux (Ubuntu/Debian)
# Autor: GitHub Copilot
# Data: 2026-01-30
# Uso: ./uninstall-docker-engine.sh
# Nota: Requer sudo/root

# Cores
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m'

# Verificar se est√° rodando como root ou com sudo dispon√≠vel
check_privileges() {
    if [ "$EUID" -ne 0 ]; then
        if ! command -v sudo &> /dev/null; then
            echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Este script precisa ser executado como root ou ter sudo dispon√≠vel${NC}"
            exit 1
        fi
        SUDO="sudo"
    else
        SUDO=""
    fi
}

# Verificar se Docker est√° instalado
check_docker_installed() {
    if ! command -v docker &> /dev/null; then
        echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ÑπÔ∏è  Docker n√£o est√° instalado. Nada a fazer.${NC}"
        exit 0
    fi
    
    DOCKER_VERSION=$(docker --version 2>/dev/null || echo "desconhecida")
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker encontrado: $DOCKER_VERSION${NC}"
}

# Confirmar desinstala√ß√£o (s√≥ em modo interativo)
confirm_uninstall() {
    # Se n√£o for terminal interativo, pular confirma√ß√£o
    if [ ! -t 0 ]; then
        return 0
    fi
    
    echo ""
    echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  ATEN√á√ÉO: Esta a√ß√£o ir√° remover:${NC}"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Docker Engine (docker-ce, docker-ce-cli)"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Containerd"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Docker Buildx e Compose plugins"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Todas as imagens, containers e volumes Docker"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Configura√ß√µes do Docker"
    echo ""
    
    read -p "‚ùì Deseja continuar? (s/n): " confirm
    if [[ ! "$confirm" =~ ^[sS]$ ]]; then
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Opera√ß√£o cancelada pelo usu√°rio.${NC}"
        exit 0
    fi
}

# Desinstalar Docker
uninstall_docker() {
    echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Desinstalando Docker Engine...${NC}"
    
    # Configurar para n√£o pedir confirma√ß√£o em apt
    export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
    
    # Parar servi√ßo Docker (com timeout)
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üõë Parando servi√ßo Docker...${NC}"
    $SUDO timeout 10 service docker stop 2>/dev/null || \
    $SUDO timeout 10 systemctl stop docker 2>/dev/null || \
    echo -e "${YELLOW}   (servi√ßo j√° parado ou timeout)${NC}"
    
    # Matar processos docker restantes
    $SUDO pkill -9 dockerd 2>/dev/null || true
    $SUDO pkill -9 containerd 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Parar todos os containers em execu√ß√£o
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üõë Parando todos os containers...${NC}"
    if $SUDO docker ps -aq 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        $SUDO docker stop $($SUDO docker ps -aq) 2>/dev/null || true
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (nenhum container encontrado)${NC}"
    fi
    
    # Remover todos os containers
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removendo todos os containers...${NC}"
    if $SUDO docker ps -aq 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        $SUDO docker rm -f $($SUDO docker ps -aq) 2>/dev/null || true
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (nenhum container para remover)${NC}"
    fi
    
    # Remover todas as imagens
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removendo todas as imagens...${NC}"
    if $SUDO docker images -aq 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        $SUDO docker rmi -f $($SUDO docker images -aq) 2>/dev/null || true
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (nenhuma imagem para remover)${NC}"
    fi
    
    # Remover todos os volumes
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removendo todos os volumes...${NC}"
    if $SUDO docker volume ls -q 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        $SUDO docker volume rm -f $($SUDO docker volume ls -q) 2>/dev/null || true
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (nenhum volume para remover)${NC}"
    fi
    
    # Remover todas as networks customizadas
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removendo networks customizadas...${NC}"
    $SUDO docker network prune -f 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Desinstalar pacotes Docker
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Desinstalando pacotes Docker...${NC}"
    $SUDO apt-get purge -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Remover pacotes √≥rf√£os
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üßπ Removendo pacotes √≥rf√£os...${NC}"
    $SUDO apt-get autoremove -y 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Remover diret√≥rios do Docker
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìÅ Removendo diret√≥rios do Docker...${NC}"
    $SUDO rm -rf /var/lib/docker
    $SUDO rm -rf /var/lib/containerd
    $SUDO rm -rf /etc/docker
    rm -rf ~/.docker
    
    # Remover chave GPG e reposit√≥rio
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîë Removendo chave GPG e reposit√≥rio...${NC}"
    $SUDO rm -f /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg
    $SUDO rm -f /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list
    
    # Remover grupo docker do usu√°rio (opcional)
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üë§ Removendo usu√°rio do grupo docker...${NC}"
    $SUDO gpasswd -d $USER docker 2>/dev/null || true
    
    # Atualizar lista de pacotes
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Atualizando lista de pacotes...${NC}"
    $SUDO apt-get update
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker Engine desinstalado com sucesso!${NC}"
    echo -e "${CYAN}üí° Todos os containers, imagens e volumes foram removidos.${NC}"
}

# Main
main() {
    echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Desinstalador do Docker Engine${NC}"
    echo ""
    
    check_privileges
    check_docker_installed
    confirm_uninstall
    uninstall_docker
}

main "$@"

{"content": "#!/bin/bash
# Script para desinstalar Docker Engine do Linux (Ubuntu/Debian/Fedora/RHEL)
# Autor: GitHub Copilot
# Data: 2026-01-30
# Nota: Este script remove completamente o Docker Engine e seus dados

# Cores para output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
WHITE='\033[1;37m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Desinstalador do Docker Engine${NC}"

# Fun√ß√£o para verificar se est√° rodando como root ou com sudo
check_privileges() {
    if [[ $EUID -ne 0 ]]; then
        if ! sudo -v &>/dev/null; then
            echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Este script precisa de privil√©gios de administrador!${NC}"
            echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Execute com: sudo $0${NC}"
            exit 1
        fi
    fi
}

# Fun√ß√£o para detectar a distribui√ß√£o
detect_distro() {
    if [[ -f /etc/os-release ]]; then
        . /etc/os-release
        DISTRO=$ID
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Distribui√ß√£o detectada: $DISTRO${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  N√£o foi poss√≠vel detectar a distribui√ß√£o, usando m√©todos gen√©ricos${NC}"
        DISTRO="unknown"
    fi
}

# Fun√ß√£o para verificar se Docker est√° instalado
check_docker_installed() {
    if command -v docker &>/dev/null; then
        DOCKER_VERSION=$(docker --version 2>/dev/null || echo "desconhecida")
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker encontrado: $DOCKER_VERSION${NC}"
        return 0
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ÑπÔ∏è  Docker n√£o est√° instalado. Nada a fazer.${NC}"
        return 1
    fi
}

# Fun√ß√£o para confirmar desinstala√ß√£o (apenas em modo interativo)
confirm_uninstall() {
    # Se n√£o for terminal interativo, pular confirma√ß√£o
    if [[ ! -t 0 ]]; then
        return 0
    fi
    
    echo ""
    echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  ATEN√á√ÉO: Esta a√ß√£o ir√° remover:${NC}"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Docker Engine (docker-ce, docker-ce-cli)"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Containerd"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Docker Buildx e Compose plugins"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Todas as imagens, containers e volumes Docker"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Configura√ß√µes do Docker"
    echo ""
    
    read -p "‚ùì Deseja continuar? (s/n): " confirm
    if [[ ! "$confirm" =~ ^[sS]$ ]]; then
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Opera√ß√£o cancelada pelo usu√°rio.${NC}"
        exit 0
    fi
}

# Fun√ß√£o para parar containers e servi√ßo
stop_docker() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üõë Parando servi√ßo Docker...${NC}"
    
    # Tentar parar via systemctl ou service
    if command -v systemctl &>/dev/null; then
        sudo systemctl stop docker.service 2>/dev/null || true
        sudo systemctl stop docker.socket 2>/dev/null || true
        sudo systemctl stop containerd.service 2>/dev/null || true
    else
        sudo service docker stop 2>/dev/null || true
    fi
    
    # Matar processos restantes
    sudo pkill -9 dockerd 2>/dev/null || true
    sudo pkill -9 containerd 2>/dev/null || true
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Servi√ßo Docker parado${NC}"
}

# Fun√ß√£o para limpar containers, imagens e volumes
cleanup_docker_data() {
    # Verificar se docker ainda est√° acess√≠vel
    if ! command -v docker &>/dev/null; then
        return 0
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üõë Parando todos os containers...${NC}"
    if sudo docker ps -aq 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        sudo docker stop $(sudo docker ps -aq) 2>/dev/null || true
        echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Containers parados${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (nenhum container encontrado)${NC}"
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removendo todos os containers...${NC}"
    if sudo docker ps -aq 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        sudo docker rm -f $(sudo docker ps -aq) 2>/dev/null || true
        echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Containers removidos${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (nenhum container para remover)${NC}"
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removendo todas as imagens...${NC}"
    if sudo docker images -aq 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        sudo docker rmi -f $(sudo docker images -aq) 2>/dev/null || true
        echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Imagens removidas${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (nenhuma imagem para remover)${NC}"
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removendo todos os volumes...${NC}"
    if sudo docker volume ls -q 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        sudo docker volume rm -f $(sudo docker volume ls -q) 2>/dev/null || true
        echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Volumes removidos${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (nenhum volume para remover)${NC}"
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removendo networks customizadas...${NC}"
    sudo docker network prune -f 2>/dev/null || true
    echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Networks removidas${NC}"
}

# Fun√ß√£o para desinstalar pacotes no Ubuntu/Debian
uninstall_docker_debian() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Desinstalando pacotes Docker...${NC}"
    
    # Configurar para n√£o pedir confirma√ß√£o
    export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
    
    sudo apt-get purge -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin docker-ce-rootless-extras 2>/dev/null || true
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üßπ Removendo pacotes √≥rf√£os...${NC}"
    sudo apt-get autoremove -y 2>/dev/null || true
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîë Removendo chave GPG e reposit√≥rio...${NC}"
    sudo rm -f /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg
    sudo rm -f /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list
    
    sudo apt-get update 2>/dev/null || true
}

# Fun√ß√£o para desinstalar pacotes no Fedora/RHEL/CentOS
uninstall_docker_rhel() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Desinstalando pacotes Docker...${NC}"
    
    sudo dnf remove -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin docker-ce-rootless-extras 2>/dev/null || \
    sudo yum remove -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin docker-ce-rootless-extras 2>/dev/null || true
}

# Fun√ß√£o para remover diret√≥rios e configura√ß√µes
remove_docker_files() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìÅ Removendo diret√≥rios do Docker...${NC}"
    
    sudo rm -rf /var/lib/docker
    sudo rm -rf /var/lib/containerd
    sudo rm -rf /etc/docker
    rm -rf ~/.docker
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Diret√≥rios removidos${NC}"
}

# Fun√ß√£o para remover usu√°rio do grupo docker
remove_user_from_group() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üë§ Removendo usu√°rio do grupo docker...${NC}"
    
    if getent group docker &>/dev/null; then
        sudo gpasswd -d $USER docker 2>/dev/null || true
        echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Usu√°rio removido do grupo docker${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (grupo docker n√£o existe)${NC}"
    fi
}

# Execu√ß√£o principal
main() {
    check_privileges
    detect_distro
    
    # Verificar se est√° instalado
    if ! check_docker_installed; then
        exit 0
    fi
    
    # Confirmar desinstala√ß√£o
    confirm_uninstall
    
    echo ""
    echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Iniciando desinstala√ß√£o do Docker Engine...${NC}"
    echo ""
    
    # Limpar dados do Docker
    cleanup_docker_data
    
    # Parar servi√ßos
    stop_docker
    
    # Desinstalar baseado na distribui√ß√£o
    case $DISTRO in
        ubuntu|debian)
            uninstall_docker_debian
            ;;
        fedora|rhel|centos)
            uninstall_docker_rhel
            ;;
        *)
            echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  Distribui√ß√£o '$DISTRO' n√£o reconhecida, tentando m√©todos gen√©ricos...${NC}"
            uninstall_docker_debian 2>/dev/null || uninstall_docker_rhel 2>/dev/null || true
            ;;
    esac
    
    # Remover diret√≥rios
    remove_docker_files
    
    # Remover usu√°rio do grupo
    remove_user_from_group
    
    echo ""
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker Engine desinstalado com sucesso!${NC}"
    echo ""
    echo -e "${CYAN}üìã O que foi removido:${NC}"
    echo -e "${WHITE}   ‚Ä¢ Docker Engine e todos os componentes${NC}"
    echo -e "${WHITE}   ‚Ä¢ Todas as imagens, containers e volumes${NC}"
    echo -e "${WHITE}   ‚Ä¢ Configura√ß√µes e chaves GPG${NC}"
    echo ""
    echo -e "${CYAN}üí° Para reinstalar, execute: ./install-docker.sh${NC}"
}

# Executar
main "$@"

{"content": "# Script to uninstall Docker Engine from Windows (WSL2)
# Author: GitHub Copilot
# Date: 2026-01-30
# Note: This script removes Docker Engine installed via WSL2

# Output colors
$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"

Write-Host "üê≥ Uninstalling Docker Engine from WSL2..." -ForegroundColor Cyan

# Check if WSL is installed
Write-Host "üîç Checking WSL installation..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$wslInstalled = $false
try {
    $wslVersion = wsl --version 2>$null
    if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
        $wslInstalled = $true
    }
} catch {
    $wslInstalled = $false
}

if (-not $wslInstalled) {
    Write-Host "‚ùå WSL is not installed. Nothing to do." -ForegroundColor Red
    exit 0
}

Write-Host "‚úÖ WSL is installed" -ForegroundColor Green

# Check if a Linux distribution is installed
Write-Host "üîç Checking installed Linux distributions..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$distroList = wsl --list --quiet 2>$null | Where-Object { $_ -and $_.Trim() -ne "" -and $_ -notmatch "docker-desktop" }
# Clean null characters that WSL sometimes returns
$distroList = $distroList | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "`0", "" } | Where-Object { $_.Trim() -ne "" }

if (-not $distroList -or @($distroList).Count -eq 0) {
    Write-Host "‚ùå No Linux distribution found. Nothing to do." -ForegroundColor Red
    exit 0
}

# Convert to array if needed
$distroList = @($distroList)

# Select distro
if ($distroList.Count -eq 1) {
    $selectedDistro = $distroList[0].Trim()
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Linux distribution found: $selectedDistro" -ForegroundColor Green
} else {
    Write-Host "üìã Multiple Linux distributions found:" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    for ($i = 0; $i -lt $distroList.Count; $i++) {
        Write-Host "   [$($i + 1)] $($distroList[$i].Trim())" -ForegroundColor White
    }
    Write-Host ""
    
    do {
        $selection = Read-Host "üêß Choose the distribution (1-$($distroList.Count))"
        $selectionIndex = [int]$selection - 1
    } while ($selectionIndex -lt 0 -or $selectionIndex -ge $distroList.Count)
    
    $selectedDistro = $distroList[$selectionIndex].Trim()
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Distribution selected: $selectedDistro" -ForegroundColor Green
}

# Check if Docker is installed in WSL
Write-Host "üîç Checking if Docker is installed in WSL ($selectedDistro)..." -ForegroundColor Yellow

$dockerInstalled = wsl -d $selectedDistro -- docker --version 2>$null
if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0 -or -not $dockerInstalled) {
    Write-Host "‚ÑπÔ∏è  Docker is not installed in this distribution. Nothing to do." -ForegroundColor Cyan
    exit 0
}

Write-Host "‚úÖ Docker found: $dockerInstalled" -ForegroundColor Green

# Confirm uninstallation
Write-Host ""
Write-Host "‚ö†Ô∏è  WARNING: This action will remove:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ Docker Engine (docker-ce, docker-ce-cli)" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ Containerd" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ Docker Buildx and Compose plugins" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ All Docker images, containers and volumes" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ Docker configurations" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host ""

$confirm = Read-Host "‚ùì Do you want to continue? (y/n)"
if ($confirm -ne "y" -and $confirm -ne "Y") {
    Write-Host "‚ùå Operation cancelled by user." -ForegroundColor Red
    exit 0
}

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê" -ForegroundColor Magenta
Write-Host "‚îÇ  üêß Running in WSL - enter sudo password if prompted       ‚îÇ" -ForegroundColor Magenta
Write-Host "‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò" -ForegroundColor Magenta
Write-Host ""

# Get bash script path (same folder as ps1 script)
$scriptDir = Split-Path -Parent $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Path
$bashScript = Join-Path $scriptDir "uninstall-docker.sh"

# Check if bash script exists
if (-not (Test-Path $bashScript)) {
    Write-Host "‚ùå Bash script not found: $bashScript" -ForegroundColor Red
    exit 1
}

# Convert Windows path to WSL
$wslPath = wsl -d $selectedDistro -- wslpath -u ($bashScript -replace '\\', '/')

# Run script in WSL interactively (allows sudo to ask for password)
# Using 'yes |' to auto-confirm since we already confirmed in PowerShell
Write-Host "üöÄ Running uninstallation in WSL..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host ""

# Direct execution - allows interaction with sudo
wsl -d $selectedDistro -- bash -c "yes | bash '$wslPath'"
$exitCode = $LASTEXITCODE

Write-Host ""

if ($exitCode -eq 0) {
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "‚úÖ Docker Engine uninstalled successfully from WSL!" -ForegroundColor Green
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "üìã What was removed:" -ForegroundColor Cyan
    Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ Docker Engine and all components" -ForegroundColor White
    Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ All images, containers and volumes" -ForegroundColor White
    Write-Host "   ‚Ä¢ Configurations and GPG keys" -ForegroundColor White
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "üí° To reinstall, run: .\install-docker.ps1" -ForegroundColor Yellow
} else {
    Write-Host "‚ùå Error during Docker uninstallation" -ForegroundColor Red
    exit 1
}

{"content": "#!/bin/bash
# Script to install Docker Engine on Linux (Ubuntu/Debian)
# Author: GitHub Copilot
# Date: 2026-01-30
# Note: This script installs Docker Engine, not Docker Desktop

# Output colors
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
WHITE='\033[1;37m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Installing Docker Engine...${NC}"

# Function to check if running as root or with sudo
check_privileges() {
    if [[ $EUID -ne 0 ]]; then
        if ! sudo -v &>/dev/null; then
            echo -e "${RED}‚ùå This script requires administrator privileges!${NC}"
            echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Run with: sudo $0${NC}"
            exit 1
        fi
    fi
}

# Function to detect the distribution
detect_distro() {
    if [[ -f /etc/os-release ]]; then
        . /etc/os-release
        DISTRO=$ID
        DISTRO_VERSION=$VERSION_CODENAME
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Distribution detected: $DISTRO ($DISTRO_VERSION)${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Could not detect the Linux distribution${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
}

# Function to check if Docker is already installed
check_docker_installed() {
    if command -v docker &>/dev/null; then
        DOCKER_VERSION=$(docker --version 2>/dev/null)
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker is already installed: $DOCKER_VERSION${NC}"
        
        # Check if the service is running
        if docker info &>/dev/null; then
            echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker is running!${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  Docker is installed but not running.${NC}"
            echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Starting Docker service...${NC}"
            
            if sudo systemctl start docker 2>/dev/null || sudo service docker start 2>/dev/null; then
                echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker service started successfully!${NC}"
            else
                echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Error starting Docker service${NC}"
                return 1
            fi
        fi
        
        # Check if user is in docker group
        if groups | grep -q docker; then
            echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ User is already in docker group${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  User is not in docker group${NC}"
            echo -e "${YELLOW}üë§ Adding user to docker group...${NC}"
            sudo usermod -aG docker $USER
            echo -e "${CYAN}üí° Logout and login again to apply changes${NC}"
        fi
        
        return 0
    fi
    return 1
}

# Function to remove old versions
remove_old_versions() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üßπ Removing old Docker versions (if any)...${NC}"
    
    for pkg in docker.io docker-doc docker-compose docker-compose-v2 podman-docker containerd runc; do
        sudo apt-get remove -y $pkg 2>/dev/null || true
    done
}

# Function to install Docker on Ubuntu/Debian
install_docker_debian() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Updating package list...${NC}"
    sudo apt-get update
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Installing dependencies...${NC}"
    sudo apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîë Adding Docker GPG key...${NC}"
    sudo install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings
    
    # Determine correct URL based on distro
    local docker_url="https://download.docker.com/linux/$DISTRO"
    
    curl -fsSL "$docker_url/gpg" | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg --yes
    sudo chmod a+r /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìã Adding Docker repository...${NC}"
    echo \
        "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg] $docker_url \
        $DISTRO_VERSION stable" | \
        sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Installing Docker Engine...${NC}"
    sudo apt-get update
    sudo apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin
}

# Function to install Docker on Fedora/RHEL/CentOS
install_docker_rhel() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Installing dependencies...${NC}"
    sudo dnf -y install dnf-plugins-core
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìã Adding Docker repository...${NC}"
    sudo dnf config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/fedora/docker-ce.repo
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Installing Docker Engine...${NC}"
    sudo dnf install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin
}

# Function to configure Docker post-installation
configure_docker() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üë§ Adding user to docker group...${NC}"
    sudo usermod -aG docker $USER
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîß Enabling Docker to start on boot...${NC}"
    if command -v systemctl &>/dev/null; then
        sudo systemctl enable docker.service
        sudo systemctl enable containerd.service
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üöÄ Starting Docker service...${NC}"
    if command -v systemctl &>/dev/null; then
        sudo systemctl start docker
    else
        sudo service docker start
    fi
}

# Function to verify installation
verify_installation() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîç Verifying installation...${NC}"
    
    # Use sudo for test since user needs to logout/login for docker group
    if sudo docker run --rm hello-world; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker Engine installed successfully!${NC}"
        return 0
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Error verifying Docker${NC}"
        return 1
    fi
}

# Main execution
main() {
    check_privileges
    detect_distro
    
    # Check if already installed
    if check_docker_installed; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}üéâ Docker is already configured and running!${NC}"
        exit 0
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Starting Docker Engine installation...${NC}"
    
    # Remove old versions
    remove_old_versions
    
    # Install based on distribution
    case $DISTRO in
        ubuntu|debian)
            install_docker_debian
            ;;
        fedora|rhel|centos)
            install_docker_rhel
            ;;
        *)
            echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Distribution '$DISTRO' is not automatically supported${NC}"
            echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Check: https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/${NC}"
            exit 1
            ;;
    esac
    
    # Post-installation configuration
    configure_docker
    
    # Verify installation
    verify_installation
    
    echo ""
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker Engine installed successfully!${NC}"
    echo ""
    echo -e "${CYAN}üìã Next steps:${NC}"
    echo -e "${WHITE}   ‚Ä¢ Logout and login again to use docker without sudo${NC}"
    echo -e "${WHITE}   ‚Ä¢ Or run: newgrp docker${NC}"
    echo ""
    echo -e "${CYAN}üí° Useful commands:${NC}"
    echo -e "${WHITE}   ‚Ä¢ docker --version     - Check version${NC}"
    echo -e "${WHITE}   ‚Ä¢ docker ps            - List containers${NC}"
    echo -e "${WHITE}   ‚Ä¢ docker compose       - Manage multi-containers${NC}"
}

# Execute
main "$@"
", "filePath": "d:\Repos\_pm\scripts\.english-version\docker\install-docker.sh"}

{"content": "#!/bin/bash
# Script to uninstall Docker Engine from Linux (Ubuntu/Debian/Fedora/RHEL)
# Author: GitHub Copilot
# Date: 2026-01-30
# Note: This script completely removes Docker Engine and its data

# Output colors
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
WHITE='\033[1;37m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Docker Engine Uninstaller${NC}"

# Function to check if running as root or with sudo
check_privileges() {
    if [[ $EUID -ne 0 ]]; then
        if ! sudo -v &>/dev/null; then
            echo -e "${RED}‚ùå This script requires administrator privileges!${NC}"
            echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Run with: sudo $0${NC}"
            exit 1
        fi
    fi
}

# Function to detect the distribution
detect_distro() {
    if [[ -f /etc/os-release ]]; then
        . /etc/os-release
        DISTRO=$ID
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Distribution detected: $DISTRO${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  Could not detect distribution, using generic methods${NC}"
        DISTRO="unknown"
    fi
}

# Function to check if Docker is installed
check_docker_installed() {
    if command -v docker &>/dev/null; then
        DOCKER_VERSION=$(docker --version 2>/dev/null || echo "unknown")
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker found: $DOCKER_VERSION${NC}"
        return 0
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ÑπÔ∏è  Docker is not installed. Nothing to do.${NC}"
        return 1
    fi
}

# Function to confirm uninstallation (only in interactive mode)
confirm_uninstall() {
    # If not interactive terminal, skip confirmation
    if [[ ! -t 0 ]]; then
        return 0
    fi
    
    echo ""
    echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  WARNING: This action will remove:${NC}"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Docker Engine (docker-ce, docker-ce-cli)"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Containerd"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Docker Buildx and Compose plugins"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ All Docker images, containers and volumes"
    echo -e "   ‚Ä¢ Docker configurations"
    echo ""
    
    read -p "‚ùì Do you want to continue? (y/n): " confirm
    if [[ ! "$confirm" =~ ^[yY]$ ]]; then
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Operation cancelled by user.${NC}"
        exit 0
    fi
}

# Function to stop containers and service
stop_docker() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üõë Stopping Docker service...${NC}"
    
    # Try to stop via systemctl or service
    if command -v systemctl &>/dev/null; then
        sudo systemctl stop docker.service 2>/dev/null || true
        sudo systemctl stop docker.socket 2>/dev/null || true
        sudo systemctl stop containerd.service 2>/dev/null || true
    else
        sudo service docker stop 2>/dev/null || true
    fi
    
    # Kill remaining processes
    sudo pkill -9 dockerd 2>/dev/null || true
    sudo pkill -9 containerd 2>/dev/null || true
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Docker service stopped${NC}"
}

# Function to clean containers, images and volumes
cleanup_docker_data() {
    # Check if docker is still accessible
    if ! command -v docker &>/dev/null; then
        return 0
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üõë Stopping all containers...${NC}"
    if sudo docker ps -aq 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        sudo docker stop $(sudo docker ps -aq) 2>/dev/null || true
        echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Containers stopped${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (no containers found)${NC}"
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removing all containers...${NC}"
    if sudo docker ps -aq 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        sudo docker rm -f $(sudo docker ps -aq) 2>/dev/null || true
        echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Containers removed${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (no containers to remove)${NC}"
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removing all images...${NC}"
    if sudo docker images -aq 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        sudo docker rmi -f $(sudo docker images -aq) 2>/dev/null || true
        echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Images removed${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (no images to remove)${NC}"
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removing all volumes...${NC}"
    if sudo docker volume ls -q 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then
        sudo docker volume rm -f $(sudo docker volume ls -q) 2>/dev/null || true
        echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Volumes removed${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (no volumes to remove)${NC}"
    fi
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üóëÔ∏è Removing custom networks...${NC}"
    sudo docker network prune -f 2>/dev/null || true
    echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Networks removed${NC}"
}

# Function to uninstall packages on Ubuntu/Debian
uninstall_docker_debian() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Uninstalling Docker packages...${NC}"
    
    # Set to not ask for confirmation
    export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
    
    sudo apt-get purge -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin docker-ce-rootless-extras 2>/dev/null || true
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üßπ Removing orphan packages...${NC}"
    sudo apt-get autoremove -y 2>/dev/null || true
    
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîë Removing GPG key and repository...${NC}"
    sudo rm -f /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg
    sudo rm -f /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list
    
    sudo apt-get update 2>/dev/null || true
}

# Function to uninstall packages on Fedora/RHEL/CentOS
uninstall_docker_rhel() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Uninstalling Docker packages...${NC}"
    
    sudo dnf remove -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin docker-ce-rootless-extras 2>/dev/null || \
    sudo yum remove -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin docker-ce-rootless-extras 2>/dev/null || true
}

# Function to remove directories and configurations
remove_docker_files() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìÅ Removing Docker directories...${NC}"
    
    sudo rm -rf /var/lib/docker
    sudo rm -rf /var/lib/containerd
    sudo rm -rf /etc/docker
    rm -rf ~/.docker
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì Directories removed${NC}"
}

# Function to remove user from docker group
remove_user_from_group() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üë§ Removing user from docker group...${NC}"
    
    if getent group docker &>/dev/null; then
        sudo gpasswd -d $USER docker 2>/dev/null || true
        echo -e "${GREEN}   ‚úì User removed from docker group${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   (docker group does not exist)${NC}"
    fi
}

# Main execution
main() {
    check_privileges
    detect_distro
    
    # Check if installed
    if ! check_docker_installed; then
        exit 0
    fi
    
    # Confirm uninstallation
    confirm_uninstall
    
    echo ""
    echo -e "${CYAN}üê≥ Starting Docker Engine uninstallation...${NC}"
    echo ""
    
    # Clean Docker data
    cleanup_docker_data
    
    # Stop services
    stop_docker
    
    # Uninstall based on distribution
    case $DISTRO in
        ubuntu|debian)
            uninstall_docker_debian
            ;;
        fedora|rhel|centos)
            uninstall_docker_rhel
            ;;
        *)
            echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  Distribution '$DISTRO' not recognized, trying generic methods...${NC}"
            uninstall_docker_debian 2>/dev/null || uninstall_docker_rhel 2>/dev/null || true
            ;;
    esac
    
    # Remove directories
    remove_docker_files
    
    # Remove user from group
    remove_user_from_group
    
    echo ""
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Docker Engine uninstalled successfully!${NC}"
    echo ""
    echo -e "${CYAN}üìã What was removed:${NC}"
    echo -e "${WHITE}   ‚Ä¢ Docker Engine and all components${NC}"
    echo -e "${WHITE}   ‚Ä¢ All images, containers and volumes${NC}"
    echo -e "${WHITE}   ‚Ä¢ Configurations and GPG keys${NC}"
    echo ""
    echo -e "${CYAN}üí° To reinstall, run: ./install-docker.sh${NC}"
}

# Execute
main "$@"
", "filePath": "d:\Repos\_pm\scripts\.english-version\docker\uninstall-docker.sh"}
